orginal.author: Zombi
orginal.license: You can change the skin as long as the license/author is not deleted and the skin is only used on Dreambox
orginal.name: Zombi-Shadow-FHD

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize() textsize=(textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 110) offset=50 if self.type==self.TYPE_YESNO: offset=110 wsizex=textsize[0] + 180 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex=800 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize=(wsizex - 20,100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)//2,(1080-wsizey)//2))

eLabel.text: F I L E L I S T
P L A Y L I S T

screen.name: DialogScreen
screen.title: DialogScreen
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize() textsize=(textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 110) offset=110 wsizex=textsize[0] + 180 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex=800 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize=(wsizex - 20,100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)//2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: DialogUpdateDelete
screen.title: DialogUpdateDelete
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize() textsize=(textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 110) offset=110 wsizex=textsize[0] + 180 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex=800 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize=(wsizex - 20,100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)//2,orgpos.y()))
